text: greetings my name is Matt Word and I'm
here at AWS headquarters in Seattle to
give you an update on Amazon workspaces
today we're announcing the launch of web
access which means you can access your
Amazon workspace through a supported
browser anywhere you can access the
internet web access address is two main
challenges first it allows you to access
your workspace without installing the
workspaces application this is useful if
you need to use your desktop from a
device you don't own or you don't use
very often second it allows you to
access your workspace from networks that
block for 1/72 this comes in handy when
you're working in a public place where
networks are often more heavily
restricted web access uses encrypted
connections to stream your desktop from
the cloud to your device rendering a
fully functional desktop right inside
your browser it can be enabled or
disabled through the AWS management
console providing you full controls over
how your workspace is accessed web
access is available for always spaces
customers from today thanks a lot
